entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:57 PM PST Monday 13 February 2023
